tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule (
  equipment_id INT,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(100),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Equipment (equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_name VARCHAR(255), purchase_date DATE, last_maintenance_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT, schedule_date DATE, status VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, schedule_id INT, log_date DATE, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Equipment ( equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_maintenance_date DATE, next_maintenance_date DATE, maintenance_interval INT NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory ( maintenance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, maintenance_date DATE, maintenance_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, technician_name VARCHAR(255), details TEXT );
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule ( schedule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, next_maintenance_date DATE, technician_id INT, notes TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Technicians ( technician_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, technician_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contact_number VARCHAR(15), experience_years INT );
